title: Jesus Has Risen
description: As you celebrate Easter, gather your family to enjoy this music video reminding us all to focus on the resurrection of Jesus Christ.
content:
Joyfully
Jesus has risen,
Jesus, our friend.
Joy fills our hearts;
He lives again.
Praises we sing to him,
This Easter-time.
Jesus has risen,
Savior divine.
Jesus has risen,
Savior divine!
Words and music:
Thelma Johnson Ryser, 1898–1984. © 1959 IRI.
Matthew 28:1–10
